channel.title: Drug Test
channel.description: So, I have a drug test Monday, and I cannot find a new way to pass my drug test. My probation officer Carl Miller is giving me a urine drug screen. He watches EVERYTHING I do. Even when I pull out my dick, he still stares down at my dick, and he watches til I piss. Creepy! So, any way to clean out my system? I'd really appreciate it.

jme:

The moral of the story is, you need to move up to cocaine, so that they can’t find it 2 days later. Try this and report back ;( ;D

item.title: Drug Test
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:90, topic:447659”][quote author=dragonskin link=topic=550551.msg4037542#msg4037542 date=1341329322]
Who all reported me? I barely passed, and by the way. I’m 16.
[/quote]
Tell us more about how it went. If you had illegal substances in your body, you shouldn’t pass? And how could you barely pass?[/quote]

Basically most drugs are only testable in urine for a couple days. Unfortunately marijuana is much longer but normally can’t be tested after 2 weeks, and for extreme users they say 30 days.

The moral of the story is, you need to move up to cocaine, so that they can’t find it 2 days later. Try this and report back ;( ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Drug Test
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:54, topic:447659”]Utterly disgusting, picking on a person thats clearly an idiot and he can’t even think for himself. Yes, I know he talks lots of bullshit stories but that gives you no right to be interfering “little twats”. You have no real affiliation with this person yet you think its good to be a “good citizen”. People all have their own releases from games, yoga, alchohol to drugs. Its not like yous were like why don’t you go to get help with drugs so your not in this situation again you were like LETS GO TAKE A DUMP ON HIS LIFE CAUSE WE CAN.
Whethor or not the OP is telling the truth this thread has made me realise something, their are some filthy, repulsive people on this site.

@Bowser, china o.o?[/quote]
It’s not our problem he takes drugs.
It’s also not our problem he’s an idiot.

Read full topic
